author: noreply@blogger.com (dinesh prabhu)
title: CRPF Recruitment 2017 Online Apply (Constables - 2908 Vacancies)
text:
Level 3 in the Pay Matrix ₹ 21,700 to 50,000/- 
Age Limit (As on 01/01/2017): Age Relaxation as per Govt. Rules 
(a) Contract / Driver (CT/DVR) -> 21 to 27 Years [Candidate should not have been born earlier than 02/01/1990 and not later than 01/01/1996 (inclusive)] (b) For all other posts (CT/Tech & Trades except CT/DVR) -> Between 18 to 23 years. The crucial date for determining the age will be 1st January 2017. [Candidate should not have been born earlier than 02/01/1994 and not later than 01/01/1999 (including the day of 02/01/1994 & 01/01/1999)] 
Educational and Technical Qualifications: 
For Constable (Driver) -> Minimum Matriculation / Xth class pass or equivalent from a recognized Board, or university recognized by the Central or State Govt. Should possess "Transport Vehicle (Heavy)" driving license and pass the driving test at the time of recruitment. 
For Constable (Mechanic Motor Vehicle) -> Minimum Matriculate or 10th Class pass in 10+2 examination system from a recognized board or equivalent. Possessing 02 years Industrial Training Institutes (ITI) certificate in Mechanic Motor Vehicle recognized by National or State Council for Vocational training or any other recognized institution and one year practical experience in the field of concerned trade OR National or State apprenticeship certificate in Mechanic Motor Vehicle Trade of three year duration from a recognized institution and one year practical experience in the field of concerned trade. 
For all Tradesmen -> Minimum matriculation / Xth class pass or equivalent from a recognized Board, or university recognized by the Central or State Govt. Must be proficient and worked in respective trades. 
Physical Standards: 
(a) Height -> Male - 170 Cms, Female - 157 Cms. b) Chest -> Unexpended - 80 Cms, Expended - Minimum Exp. 5 Cms. For Female - Not Applicable. (c) Weight -> For Males and Females - Proportionate to height and age as per medical standards and Govt. instructions. 
Selection Process : Physical Standards Test (PST), Physical Efficiency Test (PET), Documentation, Written Examination, Trade Test and Medical Examination. 
Application Fee : Candidates belonging to General and OBC category are required to pay ₹ 100/-. There is no fee for All Category Women and candidates belonging to Scheduled Caste, Scheduled Tribe and Ex- Servicemen. The Fee payable only through SBI Challan or online payment through Net banking/ credit /debit cards of any bank. 
How to Apply : Application will be accepted through Online Mode Only. The Last date for submission of online applications is 01/03/2017 .
